title: Boxes
description: Model to describe the input of block diagrams

titleFormat.description: format reference used for the title

version.description: allows to include a version for the layout description

legend.description: Legend definition used in this diagram

formats.$comment: if the map contains an key 'default' it will be used as default format
formats.description: Map of formats available to be used in the boxes

formatVariations.description: Set of formats that overwrites the style of boxes, if specific conditions are met

images.description: optional map of images used in the generated graphic

hideTextsForParents.description: If that is set, then the additional texts are only visible when the box has no visible children

globalPadding.description: Padding used as default over the whole diagram

Legend.description: Definition of the output for the legend

format.description: format reference used for the legend texts
this format reference used to identify how the here described object is in the picture displayed.

caption.description: Some kind of the main text

comment.description: additional comment, that can be then included in the created graphic

image.description: Reference to an image that should be displayed, needs to be declared in the global image section

expand.description: in case the picture is rendered with given expanded IDs, and maxDepth, then if this flag is true, the box is still displayed expanded

extVertical.description: If set, then the content for 'vertical' attrib is loaded from an external file

extHorizontal.description: If set, then the content for 'horizontal' attrib is loaded from an external file

tags.description: Tags to annotate the box, tags are used to format and filter

connections.description: List of connections to other boxes

format.description: reference to the format to use for this box

dontBlockConPaths.description: if that is set then connections can run through the box, as long as they don't cross the text

dataLink.description: Optional link to a source, related to this element. This can be used for instance for on-click handlers in a UI or simply as documentation.

hiddenComments.description: is only set by while the layout is processed, don't set it in the definition

LayoutMixin.description: container to extend the layouts of a given layout element via mixins

dest.description: Caption text of the destination box, can be used as alternative to 'destId'

comment.description: additional comment, that can be then included in the created graphic

format.description: optional format to style the connection

hiddenComments.description: is only set by while the layout is processed, don't set it in the definition

tags.description: Tags to annotate the connection, tags are used to format

widthOfParent.description: sets the width of the object to the width of the parent

fixedWidth.description: optional fixed width that will be applied on the box

fixedHeight.description: optional fixed height that will be applied on the box

verticalTxt.description: If true, the text will be displayed vertically

cornerRadius.description: radius of the box corners in pixel

hasTag.description: dictionary with tag values as key, that contains format definitions.
hasTag.$comment: when an object contains a specific tag, then it originally format, will be overwritten with the here defined values

Overlay.description: Definition of a topic related overlay ... for instance for heatmaps

caption.description: some catchy words to describe the displayed topc

refValue.description: Optional reference value that defines the reference value for this type of overlay

refRadius.description: radius for having a value of refValue

centerXOffset.description: in case of multiple overlays existing, this allows to define a percentage offset from the center-x of the related layout object

centerYOffset.description: in case of multiple overlays existing, this allows to define a percentage offset from the center-y of the related layout object

layouts.description: dictionary of layout elements, that contain this overlay. The dictionary stores the value for this specific object
layouts.$comment: keys of the dictionary are either IDs or captions of layout elements

radiusDefs.description: if this is configured the the radius for the layouts is in a percentage of the refValue

OverlayRadiusDef.description: definition how to calculate radius changes based on a reference value

min.description: minimal radius to use for the display

max.description: maximal radius to use for the display

OverlayFormatDef.description: definition what format to use for a specific reference value

default.description: default format to use to display the overlay

gradations.description: grations considered for switching for formats to use

OverlayGradation.description: gradation entry for switching formats for overlays

limit.description: to what value should the here named format being used

format.description: name of the defined format to use
